fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Loose Lips: Learn if you win with the first person you Whisper with. (Susceptible) [Activates D3]
- Connections: Learn 2 pairs of players. One of the pairs wins with each other, while the other two do not (Susceptible). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Converse: Pick a player. If they went to a Room last Night phase, learn how many players they do not win with in that Room. (Uncertain). [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only, Unlocks D2]
- Secrets: Pick a player. Learn if they have a private chat open (Trade, Whispers, faction chat, etc) at the end of the phase. [1 uses, Astral, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Tips: Gain a non-Special Item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
